metadata.title: CVE-2017-15120 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been found in the parsing of authoritative answers in PowerDNSRecursor before 4.0.8, leading to a NULL pointer dereference when parsing aspecially crafted answer containing a CNAME of a different class than IN.An unauthenticated remote attacker could cause a denial of service.

criterions.comment: pdns-recursor: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
